fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Competition, Consumers, Education and training, Energy, Business and Industry, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Climate Action, Banking and financial services, Migration and asylum
eu_initiatives:
Energy policies, financial services in general 
Specifically the proposal for a European Covered Bonds directive and Covered Bonds regulation
goals__remit: Coaching and training on European Institutions workflow and cooperation. Coaching and training on European politics and political dynamics. Both including the cooperation at all levels from member states to EU Institutions and Authorities. Case oriented consulting and advisory services are delivered as part of the overall aim of coaching and learning clients.
